dialogue.message: The Monster King is back! He sent Monsters to raid The Village, and our defenses are crumbling fast. Kill these monsters before they get out of control.

9.notification: Wave 2: Blue Bird x2 + Green Bird

12.notification: Wave 3: Blue Bird x3 + Green Bird

15.notification: Wave 4: Blue Bird x3 + Green Bird x2

18.notification: Wave 5: Blue Bird x3 + Green Bird x2

dialogue.message: You saved The Village! Here, have a reward.
If you are looking for something to do, try talking to other NPCs! There are many NPCs in The Village!

Deliver News.description: Tell everyone in The Village that the Monster Raid has been defeated.

dialogue.message: Hey, can you tell Bob that the Monster Raid has been defeated? Bob lives in a house south of here.
The Monster Raid has been defeated? That's great! Tell this news to Cyber.
He lives northwest from here.
Great! Now I can finally stop worrying about Monsters! Tell John thank you.
They said thanks? Great! Thank you for defeating the Monster Raid. I think Cyber still needs your help though.

Missing Person.description: Find Mark who has been missing in the map The River. Stop the Monster King's freeze spell.

dialogue.message: Hey, my friend Mark went to The River to collect some wood, but he hasn't been back in 2 hours! Can you go check on him? The map The River is to the west of The Village.
Oh! Hey, who are you?

response1.text: Um, your friend Bob sent me to rescue you. You have been missing for two hours.

dialogue.message: Two hours! I was here only for 5 minutes!

response1.text: It has been two hours, what do you mean?

dialogue.message: Ah! I see my time freeze spell has worked!
Yes, it is my latest spell.

response1.text: You can't do this to Mark!

dialogue.message: Fine, I'll remove the spell. As an added bonus, I'll even teleport you back!
Did you find Mark?

response1.text: Yeah, he was under a time freeze spell.

dialogue.message: A what? Never mind. Here, have your reward.

Secret Tunnels.description: Locate and travel through secret tunnels scattered around the map.

dialogue.message: Hey, do you know what to do if the Monster King raids us again?
I don't know either. I think Fisherman knows though.
Hey, do you know what to do if the Monster King raids us again?

response2.text: Yeah, there are secret tunnels we have to go through in John's garage.

dialogue.message: Great! Go talk to Fisherman!
You know where to go? Great! Can you go through the secret tunnels just so I can know that they are safe?

9.objective: Survive and go to the exit!

dialogue.message: Oh, I know where to go in case of a Monster Raid. There were some secret tunnels I think? John knows more about these secret tunnels.
Yeah, there are secret tunnels in my garage. Be careful though, because the last time I went to my garage there were a lot of monsters.
You made it! Now I know what to do in case of another Monster Raid! Here, you can have this weapon.

Weird Tower.description: Defeat all the monsters in the weird tower in the map The River.

dialogue.message: Hey, Mark told me that he saw a giant Red Bird in The River. He said it was standing on a weird tower. Can you kill this Red Bird?
I defeated Red Bird! Let me go tell Joe!
You killed this Red Bird? Great! Here, have a reward.
Hey, I love hunting, so I decided to travel to Lilypad Pathway Part 1. I found this old temple, but I went inside and there was a giant Lightning Lizard! Can you kill this Lightning Lizard for me?
I defeated Lightning Lizard! Let me go tell Kyle!
You defeated Lightning Lizard? Great! Now I can continue exploring this Temple.

Broken Sword.description: Find and fix Billy's broken sword.

dialogue.message: Hey, I heard there was a broken sword hidden somewhere in this map. Can you find it for me?

response1.text: Why do you want this broken sword?

dialogue.message: Villagers normally can't damage Monsters, but Fisherman keeps bragging about how his fishing pole can kill Birds! I want a weapon too!
Yeah, but I'm sure Wally can fix it.

response1.text: Ok, I can help you find this broken sword.

dialogue.message: Let me see... An apple, a bow, a potion, some coins... Here it is! The broken sword!
Great! You found the broken sword. But can you also deliver this sword to Wally for him to fix it?

response1.text: Yeah, I can deliver this broken sword to Wally.

dialogue.message: Billy wants me to fix this sword? I can do that!
Here you go, as good as new!
Yay! Wally fixed the sword!

Wood Delivery.description: Deliver some wood to Wally in Deserted Town.

dialogue.message: Hey, can you deliver this wood to Wally in Deserted Town? To get to Deserted Town just keep heading left. Wally should be in his blacksmith.
My wood delivery is here? Great! Go say thanks to Bob for me.
Wally said thanks? Well that's nice!

Lost Rubies.description: Find some lost rubies in the Town Cave.

dialogue.message: My friend Wally lost some rubies in the Town Cave the other day. Could you please find them and return it to me? If you don't know, the Town Cave is northwest of The Guarded Citadel.
I found the rubies! Let me return them to Sally.
You found the rubies? Great! Here, you can have some of the rubies.

Broken Piano.description: Find Piano Parts to fix Mia's piano.

dialogue.message: Hey, do you want to listen to me playing the piano?
*Insert TianmuGuarder piano playing noises*

response1.text: Umm.. That sounds kind of bad.

dialogue.message: Thank you for that compliment!
Yeah, because my piano broke.

response1.text: I can help you fix your piano.

dialogue.message: Great! I will need Piano Parts to fix my piano. 5 Piano Parts should be enough. I think Wally might be able to make some Piano Parts. You can also try searching in different maps.
Mia needs Piano Parts to fix her piano? I think I can make one!
I got 5 Piano Parts! I should give them to Mia right away.
You found 5 Piano Parts! Great! Now I can fix my Piano!

Pet Training.description: Train your pet to become stronger.

dialogue.message: Do you want to train your pet?

response1.text: Yeah, my pet needs to be stronger.

dialogue.message: Great! I will teleport you to the training arena.
Remember: You can't fight, but your pet can! Kill all 5 waves of Monsters to win.

9.objective: Make your pet kill all 5 waves of Monsters!

dialogue.message: Wow! I can't believe your pet killed all the monsters! Your pet really is strong!

Monster Search.description: Search for a way to kill all the monsters.

dialogue.message: Do you want to help me find a way to stop Sand Birds from spawning?

Well, most of Deserted Town's trade to The Village is through the Wandering Trader. He is the only person that is experienced enough to go through The Outskirts. As you might predict, this harms trade a lot. It would really help if there were no Sand Birds in The Outskirts, because once you touch a Sand Bird you are basically dead.
Great! The Pet Master knows something about Monsters spawning.

You want to learn about Monsters spawning? Basically there are tunnels underground that Monsters travel through. Then the Monsters pop out of secret 1-way trapdoors. When I made The Pet Arena, I also installed trapdoors that I bought from the Wandering Trader. The Wandering Trader might know more about these trapdoors.
These trapdoors? Oh, I found them in front of a house somewhere in The Forest.
I think this is the Mysterious House.
Ahh! What's happening to me!
Who are you? Ah, hello *username*! How did you even get in here? I'm sure I marked off every teleporter.
You're already trying to fight me? Players are always aggressive.

response1.text: Yeah, so I am agressive and will kill you.

response2.text: What? I'm just trying to complete a quest!

response3.text: What about you sending Monsters to raid The Village?

dialogue.message: Not if I kill you first!
Then why did you say you wanted to kill me?

response2.text: I misclicked. I wanted to click [I just want to complete this quest!]

dialogue.message: You weren't patient enough. Why didn't you wait until a better option came up?

response1.text: I didn't know there were other options.

dialogue.message: You weren't patient enough. Why didn't you wait until a better option came up?

response1.text: I didn't know there were other options.

response2.text: What do you mean? I did wait a LONG time! And no other option came up!

dialogue.message: Oh. Oops. I made a mistake, there is no other option. Wait, that means you want to kill me!
That doesn't matter. Monsters! Kill *username*!
Completing a quest isn't just spamming the first option. Now, choose carefully. One answer is correct, but the other two will doom you.

response2.text: Your Monsters are dumb and stupid.

dialogue.message: Completing a quest isn't just spamming the first option. Now, choose carefully. One answer is correct, but the other two will doom you.

response2.text: Your Monsters are dumb and stupid.

dialogue.message: I see you have learned your lesson. Let me finish your quest for you.
You chose the wrong answer. Monsters! Kill *username*!
You don't care about anything that happens in this universe. You Monster! You just want to complete all the quests and get all the best items! Monsters! Kill *username*!
Oh, that was because of some Birds that escaped. Not my fault.

response1.text: You could have kept those Birds in cages or something.

dialogue.message: Cages! You Monster! Let me keep you in a cage to see how you like it.
How do you like being in a cage?
Just like I expected. Now, Monsters! Kill *username*!
HOW ARE YOU STILL ALIVE!
You defeated my Monsters. You have grown stronger since the Monster Raid. It will be some time until we meet again.
Hey, I lost some candies! Can you find them for me? I really want them back.
I found Riley's Candies! I should return them to Riley.
Yay! You found my candies!
